title: Relates to 911 calls made on prepaid cell phones
summary: Relates to 911 calls made on cell phones; requires all cell phones sold in the state to be capable of dialing 911 regardless of whether the consumer has entered or maintained a service contract; imposes a surcharge on prepaid wireless communications service.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to wireless communications devices; and to amend the tax law, in relation to a surcharge on prepaid wireless communications service
